string-array.name: defaultTasksStringArray
string-array.item: Relax
Progressive Muscle Relaxation
Invocations
Turn Inwards
Create a Gateway
Meet your Guide
Intention
Journey
Return
Journal Entry

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray0
string-array.item: Ensure that you remain undisturbed for the next one hour. Ensure that there are no people, pets or noise or music in the room. Lie down on your bed comfortably
Ensure that nothing is touching you except sheets, blanket or pillows
Be on your back, arms on sides, legs straight and not crossed. Head and shoulders slightly above body level
Close your eyes, breathe naturally

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray1
string-array.item: Relax all your muscles one by one without lifting any body parts. Lets start now
Tense your feet muscles. Moderately, not too tight, not too loose
Relax them
Tense your calf muscles. Hold for a second
Relax them
Tense your thigh muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your butt muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your abdominal muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your lower back muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your chest muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your upper back muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your shoulder muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your arm muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your hand muscles. Make a fist. Hold. Relax them
Tense your neck muscles. Hold. Relax them
Tense your jaw and head muscles. Hold. Relax them
Take a deep breath. Exhale
You are deeply relaxed now

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray2
string-array.item: Recall the name and face of your Guru or anyone you respect.
Repeat after me.
I request your kind help in my exploration of Astral worlds.
I seek your guidance, protection and support.
May this journey bring me needed knowledge and wisdom.
May this adventure benefit all and everything.
Thank you.
Feel the blessings of your respected one in your body, as blissful shiver.
You are now safe and well protected.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray3
string-array.item: Focus your attention to the touch sensations in your body.
Ignore the touch sensations by bringing your attention to a place behind your eyes.
Focus your attention on any external sounds.
Ignore them as before.
If your attention wanders back to external sensations, bring it back again.
Focus on the darkness behind your eyes.
Bring your attention to the center of your head.
Remain here.
Ignore any internal sounds, noises, voices or flashes of light or faces. They are illusory.
You have turned inwards.
It is peaceful here.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray4
string-array.item: You will now open the inner eye.
Visualize an empty hall. It is big and has white walls and a marble floor.
You are in the center looking all around.
You see a big door in front of you. It is open and very bright sunlight is pouring in through it.
Move to the door slowly. It gets nearer and bigger as you approach it.
It leads to an open space with lots of trees and plants, its a garden. Bright green.
Remain here.
Its bright and beautiful here. Fresh air with fragrance of flowers.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray5
string-array.item: Make an intention to see your guide here. Strongly hold the idea that they are here.
See your guide in their usual form. They are smiling at you.
You should exchange greetings now.
Ask how are they, and wait for an answer.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray6
string-array.item: Make an intention to visit the place you wish to visit. Hold this idea firmly.
Let your guide know your intention.
Hear your own voice saying it.
If you having nothing specific, ask your guide to take you to any place where you can learn.
Let the guide decide.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray7
string-array.item: The Guide is now holding your hand. You are ready to go.
The garden and sky is dissolving.
A tunnel appears and you step in it with your guide.
My voice is fading now.
Wish you a happy journey. I will wait here.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray8
string-array.item: Can you hear me?
Lets go back to the body.
Remember, you were lying down in this room. Come here.
Become aware of darkness behind your eyes.
Wiggle your big toe.
Move your feet and hand.
Open your eyes slowly.
Stay here.
Recall what happened.

string-array.name: defaultDetStringArray9
string-array.item: I suggest you write down todays events now.
Do not forget to write any new lessons you learnt.
See you soon.
